title: 3 Profitable Amazon KDP Keywords: Workbooks: Low Competition High Demand #KDP #kdpkeywords

tactics.name: Niche Down for BSR Optimization
tactics.description: Target specific demographics or workbook formats to lower bestseller rank competition
steps: Identify niche demographics (e.g., age groups, genders, specific identities)
Focus on workbook formats (daily/weekly prompts, specific therapeutic applications)
Combine niche demographics with format (e.g., 'black women + 365-day DBT journal')
caveats: May require additional content creation for niche specificity

tactics.name: Niche Long-Tail Keywords
tactics.description: Target specific niches with long-tail keywords to reduce competition and increase profitability
steps: Add use cases (e.g., life skills for autism)

heuristics.name: Review Count Threshold
heuristics.condition: If average reviews are below 200, prioritize for growth potential
